moduleTitle: Python Basics for Kids - Bilkul Shuru Se

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Computer Kya Hai? Programming Kya Hai?

content.intro: Bilkul basic se start karte hain! Computer ek machine hai jo hamari baat manta hai. Programming matlab computer ko instructions dena. Jaise hum kisi ko kehte hain 'paani lao', waise hi computer ko kehte hain 'calculation karo'.

sections.heading: Computer Kaise Kaam Karta Hai?
sections.text:
Computer ek bahut tez calculator hai:

1. Input - Hum kuch dete hain (keyboard, mouse se)
2. Processing - Computer sochta hai
3. Output - Computer jawab deta hai (screen pe)

Misal:
• Input: 2 + 3
• Processing: Computer calculate karta hai
• Output: 5

Computer sirf 0 aur 1 samajhta hai (Binary language)
Programming languages hume aasan tarike se computer se baat karne deti hain

sections.heading: Programming Language Kya Hai?
sections.text:
Programming language ek translator hai:

• Hum English jaisi language mein likhte hain
• Computer 0 aur 1 mein samajhta hai
• Programming language translation kar deti hai

Python kyu special hai?
1. Bahut aasan - English jaisi
2. Kam typing - zyada kaam
3. Powerful - bade kaam kar sakti hai
4. Popular - duniya bhar mein use hoti hai
5. Free - koi paisa nahi lagta

sections.heading: Python Kahan Use Hoti Hai?
sections.text:
Har jagah Python use hoti hai:

🌐 Websites:
• YouTube - videos manage karta hai
• Instagram - photos process karta hai
• Dropbox - files store karta hai

🤖 AI/Machine Learning:
• Google Search - results deta hai
• Netflix - movies suggest karta hai
• Tesla - self-driving cars

📊 Data Analysis:
• Banks - fraud detect karte hain
• Hospitals - patient data analyze karte hain
• Weather - forecast karte hain

🎮 Games:
• Civilization IV
• Battlefield 2
• Many mobile games

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Python Install Karna - Step by Step

content.intro: Ab Python ko apne mobile/computer mein install karenge. Yeh bilkul free hai aur easy hai. Step by step follow kariye.

sections.heading: Mobile Mein Python (Termux)
sections.text:
Mobile mein Python use karne ke liye Termux app chahiye:

1. Play Store se Termux download kariye
2. Termux open kariye
3. Neeche diye gaye commands type kariye

commands.explanation: Yeh command Termux ko latest version mein update kar deta hai. Thoda time lagega, wait kariye.
Yeh command Python install kar dega. 'y' press karke enter dabayiye jab puchhe.

commands.description: Step 3: Check karna ki Python install hua ya nahi
commands.explanation: Agar Python 3.x.x version show ho raha hai matlab successfully install ho gaya!

sections.heading: Computer Mein Python (Windows/Mac/Linux)
sections.text:
Computer mein install karne ke liye:

1. python.org website pe jaye
2. Download Python button pe click kare
3. Downloaded file run kare
4. 'Add Python to PATH' checkbox check kare
5. Install button pe click kare

Linux mein terminal se install kar sakte hain:

commands.command: sudo apt update && sudo apt install python3 python3-pip
commands.explanation: Yeh command Linux mein Python aur pip (package manager) install kar deta hai.

sections.heading: Python Test Karna
sections.text: Ab check karte hain ki Python properly kaam kar raha hai:

commands.explanation: Yeh command Python ka interactive shell start kar deta hai. >>> symbols nazar aayenge.
Python mein direct math kar sakte hain. Answer 5 aana chahiye.
Yeh text screen pe print ho jana chahiye.
Yeh command Python interactive mode se bahar aa jane ke liye hai.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Python Calculator - Math Karna Seekhte Hain

content.intro: Python ek powerful calculator hai! Yahan hum basic math operations seekhenge. Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division - sab kuch!

sections.heading: Basic Math Operations
sections.text:
Python mein math karna bahut aasan hai. Yeh symbols use karte hain:

+ Addition (jodna)
- Subtraction (ghatana)
* Multiplication (guna)
/ Division (bhag)
** Power (power)
% Modulo (remainder)

commands.explanation: 5 aur 3 ko jodne se 8 milega. Python mein + symbol addition ke liye use hota hai.

commands.description: Subtraction - Ek number se dusra ghatana
commands.explanation: 10 mein se 4 ghatane se 6 milega. - symbol subtraction ke liye hai.
6 ka 7 se guna karne se 42 milega. * symbol multiplication ke liye hai.

commands.description: Division - Ek number ko dusre se divide karna
commands.explanation: 15 ko 3 se divide karne se 5.0 milega. / symbol division ke liye hai.

commands.description: Power - Kisi number ka power nikalna
commands.explanation: 2 ki power 3 matlab 2 x 2 x 2 = 8. ** symbol power ke liye hai.

sections.heading: Advanced Math Operations
sections.text: Thode advanced operations bhi kar sakte hain:

commands.explanation: 17 ko 5 se divide karne pe remainder 2 bachta hai. % symbol remainder ke liye hai.
17 divide by 5 = 3.4, lekin // sirf 3 deta hai (decimal part cut kar deta hai).
Brackets pehle solve hote hain: (15) * 2 - 3 = 30 - 3 = 27
Kisi number ka square root nikalne ke liye power 0.5 karte hain. 16 ka square root 4 hai.

sections.heading: Real Life Math Examples
sections.text: Practical examples jo daily life mein use hote hain:

commands.explanation: Teen items ki price jodna: 250 + 150 + 75 = 475 rupees total
85 marks out of 100 ka percentage: 85%. Formula: (obtained/total) * 100
Teen subjects ke marks ka average: (80+90+75)/3 = 81.67
1000 rupees pe 10% interest 2 saal ke liye: 1000 * 1.1^2 = 1210
